content: Internal memo dated May 2024 outlines provider education initiative for Policy PFD-312 compliance. Mandatory webinars scheduled June 4-6 cover: coding updates, documentation standards, and transitional requirements for grandfathered cases. Target groups include all urologists, OB/GYNs, and physical therapists treating pelvic floor dysfunction. Registration available through provider portal using NET-IDS issued after credentialing.
